name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website Down Checker - Is Website Down for Everyone or Just Me?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if a website is down for everyone or just you with our instant website down checker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is the website down for everyone or just you? Find out instantly with this Website Down Checker. You can check if any site is offline or experiencing issues with one quick click, giving you real-time status insights.

Whether youâ€™re troubleshooting your own site or just curious if another site is down, this tool provides an instant answer. Reliable, fast, and easy to use!

How it works? 

- Open the Extension: Click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.
- Enter Website URL: Type in the site URL you want to check.
- Get Instant Results: Click on the Check Status button, and it will instantly display whether the website is down for everyone, along with basic response speed.
